programs.title: B.Tech Computer Science & Engineering
programs.description: Our B.Tech Computer Science & Engineering program is designed to produce industry-ready software engineers and technology leaders. With a perfect blend of theoretical knowledge and practical application, students gain expertise in cutting-edge technologies including AI, machine learning, cloud computing, and software development. Our curriculum is continuously updated in collaboration with industry partners to ensure graduates are equipped with the most relevant skills demanded by top technology companies.
highlights: Strong placement record with top tech companies
Opportunities for internships and industry collaborations
Regular workshops and guest lectures by industry experts

academicRequirements: Minimum 60% marks in 12th standard with PCM (Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics)
Valid JEE Main score (preferred but not mandatory)
Age limit: Maximum 25 years as on date of admission
Must have studied English as a compulsory subject in 12th standard
eligibility.entranceExam: JEE Main (preferred) or FS University Entrance Test

scholarships: Merit-based scholarships up to 50% fee waiver
facilities: Advanced Computer Labs with latest hardware
Software Development Lab with industry-standard tools
AI & Machine Learning Lab with GPU clusters
Cybersecurity Lab with ethical hacking tools
Digital Library with access to research databases

programs.title: Master of Business Administration
programs.description: Our MBA program is designed to create future business leaders and entrepreneurs. With a comprehensive curriculum covering all aspects of business management, students develop strategic thinking, leadership skills, and industry knowledge required to excel in the corporate world.
highlights: Strong alumni network in top companies

scholarships: Merit-based scholarships up to 40% fee waiver

programs.title: Diploma in Pharmacy
programs.description: Our Diploma in Pharmacy program is designed to prepare competent pharmacy professionals who can contribute effectively to healthcare delivery. The curriculum combines theoretical knowledge with practical training in pharmaceutical sciences, ensuring graduates are well-equipped to work in various pharmaceutical settings including retail pharmacies, hospitals, pharmaceutical industries, and drug regulatory agencies.

academicRequirements: 10+2 with Physics, Chemistry, Biology/Mathematics (45% for General, 40% for SC/ST)
Must have passed 12th standard from a recognized board
Minimum age: 17 years, Maximum age: 25 years
Medical fitness certificate required
eligibility.entranceExam: Merit-based selection + Counseling

scholarships: Financial assistance for economically weaker sections

programs.title: Diploma in Elementary Education (D.El.Ed)
programs.description: The Diploma in Elementary Education (D.El.Ed) is a comprehensive teacher training program designed to prepare qualified and competent teachers for elementary education (Classes I-VIII). The program focuses on child psychology, pedagogy, curriculum development, and practical teaching methods to ensure graduates can effectively contribute to quality elementary education in both government and private schools.

academicRequirements: 10+2 from recognized board with minimum 50% marks (45% for SC/ST)
Must have passed 12th standard in any stream
Minimum age: 18 years, Maximum age: 35 years
Basic computer literacy preferred
eligibility.entranceExam: Entrance test + Interview + Document verification

faculty.name: Prof. Ramesh Kumar
faculty.qualifications: M.Ed Child Psychology, Jamia Millia Islamia

programs.title: B.Tech Mechanical Engineering
programs.description: Our B.Tech Mechanical Engineering program provides a comprehensive foundation in mechanical systems design, manufacturing, thermal sciences, and materials engineering. Students gain hands-on experience with state-of-the-art equipment and software tools used in modern mechanical engineering practice. The curriculum emphasizes both traditional mechanical engineering principles and emerging technologies like robotics, automation, and sustainable energy systems.
highlights: Hands-on experience with CNC machines and 3D printing
Strong foundation in thermal and fluid sciences
Industry partnerships for internships and projects
Regular industrial visits and expert lectures

academicRequirements: Minimum 60% marks in 12th standard with PCM (Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics)

programs.title: B.Tech Civil Engineering
programs.description: Our B.Tech Civil Engineering program prepares students for careers in infrastructure development, construction management, and urban planning. The curriculum covers all major areas of civil engineering including structural engineering, transportation, water resources, geotechnical engineering, and environmental engineering. Students gain practical experience through field work, laboratory experiments, and industry projects, preparing them to address modern infrastructure challenges.
highlights: Comprehensive coverage of all civil engineering disciplines
State-of-the-art structural and materials testing labs
Strong focus on sustainable construction practices
Modern software training (AutoCAD, STAAD Pro, etc.)
Regular site visits to ongoing construction projects
Research opportunities in smart cities and green buildings

Students learn to work with cutting-edge technologies including 5G networks, IoT devices, embedded systems, and VLSI design. The curriculum balances theoretical concepts with practical applications, preparing graduates for careers in telecommunications, semiconductor industry, and emerging technologies.

Strong focus on VLSI design and embedded systems

programs.description: Our M.Sc Mathematics program provides advanced study in pure and applied mathematics, preparing students for research careers, higher studies, and specialized roles in academia and industry. The curriculum covers advanced topics in algebra, analysis, topology, differential equations, and mathematical modeling. Students engage in rigorous mathematical research and develop expertise in computational mathematics and statistical analysis.

The program emphasizes rigorous research methodology, theoretical foundations, and practical applications in various management domains. Students work closely with experienced faculty mentors to conduct original research that addresses contemporary business challenges and contributes to academic literature.
